title: Gasless DNS Name Claiming
description: Our team is working on a gas-free method for claiming DNS names utilizing CCIP Read.

title: ENSJS V3 Refactor
description: We're in the process of re-factoring ENSJS, an essential tool that provides JavaScript bindings for the Ethereum Name Service

title: Development Pipeline Improvements
description: Changes are being made to our testing pipeline to allow feature releases to be expedited.
